document_data.mainbody:
sctl Sleeping Turtle was a ruler in Far Payit in Maztica.
Osctl was one of the seven cheitains in the Ixtzul valley when the Star Worm fell from the sky. He was the first to reach the creature, still encased in a meteorite, and intended to make a bargain with the creature so he could gain power.
What happened afterward was unknown, except that the Star Worm was bound in a magical slumber. The city of Ixtzul was founded by Osctls tribe over where it slept, and he became the first Revered Counselor of Ixtzul. By claiming that he had made a bargain with the Star Worm and it was their protector, the tribe gained power over the other tribes.
